title: HTTP(S) benchmark tools, testing/debugging, & restAPI (RESTful)
content:
HTTP(S) benchmark tools, testing/debugging, & restAPI (RESTful)
https://github.com/denji/awesome-http-benchmark
92 forks.
1,206 stars.
6 open issues.
Recent commits:

  • cassowaryCassowary is a modern HTTP/S, intuitive & cross-platform load testing tool built in Go for developers, testers and sysadmins. Cassowary draws inspiration from awesome projects like k6, ab & httpstat.* 2 Load Testing modes: one standard and one spread mode where URL Paths can be specified from a file (ideal if you want to hit several underlying microservices)* CI Friendly: Well-suited to be part of a CI pipeline step* Flexible metrics: Prometheus metrics (pushing metrics to Prometheus PushGateway), JSON file* Configurable: Able to pass in arbitrary HTTP headers* Cross Platform: One single pre-built binary for Linux, Mac OSX and Windows, GitHub
  • Deleted finshirResolved #10, GitHub
  • Add autocannon (#9), Denis Denisov
  • Add httping: (#8)https://github.com/flok99/httpingPing with HTTP requests, see http://www.vanheusden.com/httping/, Denis Denisov
  • Add description of h1load, Denis Denisov
